title: The Five Gifts to Survive Tragedies - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/3/18
itunes:title: The Five Gifts to Survive Tragedies - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/3/18
description:
George Noory and psychologist Dr. Laurie Nadel discuss her theories of the five mental skills people need to survive personal tragedies in their lives and how to deal with the many traumas in the modern world.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
